events.title: OMS: Song Sharing & Discussion
events.description: Join an evening of song sharing, reflection, and community conversation around the meanings we find in music.

events.title: Community Song Circle
events.location: Give Something Back to Berlin, The Blue House on Donau
events.description: A community-based event centered on song sharing and discussion about personal meaning and connection through music.

events.title: Neurodivergent Music Therapy: Song Sharing and Discussion
events.description: Join an open discussion for music lovers. Listen to music and talk about what it means to you. Share a song that’s been on repeat this week and tell us what you love about it.

events.title: Neurodivergent Music Therapy: Song Sharing and Discussion - Holiday Season
events.description: 'Tis the season for sharing and connection! Join our festive open discussion for music lovers. We'll listen to holiday tunes and heartwarming songs, and talk about the memories and feelings they evoke. Share a song that defines your holiday season—whether it's classic carols, festive pop, or a wintery ballad—and tell us the story behind it.
